text: Hē muminasakala! Tōmālōkē ēnē kōnō biṣaẏē praśna nakaraibā yiṭō tōmālōkara ōcarata prakāśa karaā ha’lē sēẏā tōmālōkaka kaṣṭa diba. Ārau kōra'āna aratīrṇa hōraāra samaẏata tōmālōkē yadi tēnēkuraā kōnō praśna karaā tēntē sēẏā tōmālōkara ōcarata prakāśa karaā ha’ba. Āllāhē sē'ibōra kṣamā karaichē ārau āllāha kṣamāśīla, sahanaśīla
